statement_text: A few days later, the virus was found in a Michigan dairy herd that had recently added cows from Texas. This [finding of the virus in a Michigan herd] is the first time the H5N1 influenza virus has been detected in cattle in the U.S., according to the Texas Department of State Health Services.
